Text:
Get into the Fitness zone with Bollywood superstar Bipasha Basu and tackle stubborn problem areas with a set of sure shot circuit training routines that combine upper and lower body sculpting moves to burn fat even faster.

Say goodbye to all trouble zones with this heart-pounding workout - Biginners and Advanced.

This DVD includes the following workout regime:
Introduction To Love Yourself
Introduction to Fit and fabulous You
25 Mins Biginners Workout
25 Mins Advanced Workouts
3 Levels of Circuit Training - BB Strength Moves, BB Cardio Burn and BB Ab Drill
5 Min Warm Up
2 Min Cool Down
